Articles.Content: I'm going to start a new KSP fanfiction soon on this forum, but there is one thing I need to now how to do: Link to individual posts. How do they do it?
See the little number in the top right of the post box? Right click that.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107774-How-to-link-to-posts?p=1678902&viewfull=1#post1678902 now to see if it worked

It did! thanks!

Moved to the Kerbal Network.

And you can make short links using [noparse]link text here[/noparse] -- just grab the number digits at the very end of the post link and put them in the BBCode.

Results in this, btw, I have no idea what post that links to (I literally just picked random numbers):

link text here
it's a link to post in the RSS thread.

It's now possible to link to specific parts of a post rather than splitting the post up into several for linking. Details here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107828-Goto-Line-Basically-%29

No, only works on a given page as I understand it.
If you're trying to link to sections from another page entirely, a standard url tag should be capable of doing so.
